name: American Bass Challenge
description: American Bass Challenge, known in Japan and Europe as Super Black Bass Advance (スーパーブラックバス アドバンス), is a fishing video game developed by Starfish for the Game Boy Advance. It was published in Japan by Starfish on August 8, 2001, and in North America by Ubisoft on December 5, 2001. It is the eleventh game in the Black Bass series, though the Black Bass name was not used for the North American release.
